frontmatter.title: Making the CNCF Landscape Interactive with Meshery
frontmatter.description: Join the Kubesimplify livestream for an engaging livestream where we dive into the dynamic world of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) Landscape and explore how Meshery, the collaborative cloud native manager, is revolutionizing it. In this session, we’ll demonstrate how Meshery not only simplifies the management of all Kubernetes-based infrastructure, but also makes the CNCF Landscape interactive, allowing for a more intuitive and hands-on experience.
